name: Objects Dark
description:
One day Sika, a young girl living on the coast of the kingdom of Eltia, accidentally releases the Dark Lord Norgoth from where they were sealed many years before! Now their souls are bound together and Sika must travel with Norgoth and help them recover the power that they have lost.

  • Join Sika and Norgoth on their quest to plunge the kingdom of Eltia into darkness! 
  • Meet, insult and help a cast of colourful characters!
  • Encounter strange and curious creatures, most of which want to eat you!
  • This and more in a top-down, open world adventure!

Download it now!

Or don't...

But please do.
